vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πειλᾶτος (Rec. Πιλάτος, Tr., -ᾶτος, see WH, App., 155), -ου, ὁ,
Pontius Pilate: Mat.27:2, Mrk.15:1, Luk.3:1, Jhn.18:29, Act.3:13, 1Ti.6:13, al
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.2; also called Pontius at Mat.27.2; 3x
§ Pilate, "[family name]"
Pilate, (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彼拉多 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "以矛槍為武器"
第六任猶大與撒瑪利亞的羅馬總督,下令將耶穌釘十字架
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
彼拉多 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "以矛枪为武器"
第六任犹大与撒玛利亚的罗马总督,下令将耶稣钉十字架
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Phi-lát (Bôn-xơ). Nhậm chức tổng đốc. Nguồn gốc La-tinh
